titles.title: To extend the deadlines applicable to certain hydroelectric projects under the Federal Power Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: 11/22/1993--Introduced. Directs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon the request of specified licensees, to extend, for a maximum of three consecutive two-year periods, the time required for commencement of construction of certain hydroelectric projects.
